title: Morse Code and Radio Chatter Sound Toolkit
description: Morse Code messages and radio chatter modular toolkit. Includes both game-ready generic radio-transmission sound Cues and a library of useful phrases in Morse to assemble into custom messages tailored to your game.
longDescription:
Preview sounds here:

https://soundcloud.com/user-665009105/morse-code-and-radio-chatter-modular-sound-library


List of message building-blocks from which radio conversations are assembled:

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1LkkRk7w66d79UXnqFXXAxJb0u8bLmqyHv6daY4FfTNY/edit?usp=sharing
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Several game-ready generic Morse-code radio-transmission sound cues with variants offering different levels of radio noise and distortion.
  •  70+ modular Morse message building-blocks that assemble into customized messages (eg "ENEMY CONTACT", "TO THE SOUTH", "REQUEST ASSISTANCE" etc.)
  •  Sound Cue templates for easy assembly of message blocks into custom messages with radio noise/distortion options. (Tutorial included.)

Number of Audio Waves: 70+

Number of Audio Cues: 70+

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Mono WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: ~10 minutes of Morse blocks and radio noise that can be recombined into different messages.

Supported Development Platforms: PC

Supported Target Build Platforms: PC

Documentation: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1LkkRk7w66d79UXnqFXXAxJb0u8bLmqyHv6daY4FfTNY/edit?usp=sharing
